channel.title: applescript on Anders Bergh
channel.description: Recent content in applescript on Anders Bergh

item.title: Remove duplicate tracks in an iTunes playlist
Adding the currently playing track to a playlist using AppleScript
item.description: I’m not very good at using AppleScript, but here’s a simple script that you or someone else might find useful.

item.title: Add current track to monthly playlist
item.description: This script will add the currently playing track to a monthly playlist (format: YYYY-mm). It creates it if it doesn’t exist. I’ve bound the script to F6 using Quicksilver.
